document.heading: Appointment of the Board of Directors to UMIT Technologies, LLC
document.text: At a duly called Regular Meeting of the Council held this 22 day of June, 2024, the following Resolution and Law were adopted.

recital.text: the Upper Mattaponi Tribe Council ("Council") is vested with the authority to enact laws and Budget Resolutions pursuant to Article VII, Section 4(a) of the Constitution of the Upper Mattaponi Tribe ("Constitution"); and,
the Council formed Upper Mattaponi Indian Tribe Technologies, LLC as a Tribally Owned Limited Liability Company pursuant to the Upper Mattaponi Limited Liability Code; and

in Section 10 of the Operating Agreement for Upper Mattaponi Indian Tribe Technologies, LLC, Tribal Council delegated the management of the Company and all business affairs to a set of Board of Directors; and
that the Upper Mattaponi Tribe Council hereby sets the number of seats on the Board of Directors for Upper Mattaponi Indian Tribe Technologies, LLC to three (3); and
that the Upper Mattaponi Tribe Council hereby appoints the following to serve as the Board of Directors for Upper Mattaponi Indian Tribe Technologies, LLC:

procedural-data.text: The foregoing Resolution was duly voted upon by the Council on the 22 day of June, 2024, at a Regular Meeting with a vote of 5 in favor and 0 opposed, 0 abstaining, and 2 absent, pursuant to the authority vested in the Council by the Constitution of the Tribe.
